HerculesTheme

Update: 29.10.2014 - Hercules v.1.5
Fixed: Responsive slider arrows positioning
Fixed: Last menu item is visibile in low resolutions
Added: Login / Register Page
One-page and Multi-page merged in one

Added in multi-page version 3 more pages:
1 Shop page
2 Single Product
3 Cart page

Fix - Gallery slides

Fix - contact-form
Fix - slider's slide position

Update: 22.08.2014 - Hercules v.1.1
Added in multi-page + 8 new pages:
1 Blog 2 columns left sidebar
2 Blog 2 columns right sidebar
3 Blog 3 columns left sidebar
4 Error-404 Page

8 Shortcodes page
